title: The Virgin Mary Had A Baby Boy

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: The Virgin Mary had a baby boy
The Virgin Mary had a baby boy
The Virgin Mary had a baby boy
And they said that His name was Jesus

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: He come from the glory
He come from the glorious kingdom
He come from the glory
He come from the glorious kingdom
Oh yes believer oh yes believer
He come from the glory
He come from the glorious kingdom

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: The angels sang when the baby born
The angels sang when the baby born
The angels sang when the baby born
And proclaimed Him the Saviour Jesus

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: The wise men saw where the baby born
The wise men saw where the baby born
The wise men saw where the baby born
And they saw that His name was Jesus

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Away in a manger no crib for a bed
The little Lord Jesus
laid down His sweet head
The stars in the bright sky
looked down where He lay
The little Lord Jesus asleep on the hay

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: The cattle are lowing the baby awakes
But little Lord Jesus no crying He makes
I love You Lord Jesus
look down from the sky
And stay by my side until morning is nigh

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Be near me Lord Jesus I ask You to stay
Close by me forever and love me I pray
Bless all the dear children in Your tender care
And fit us for heaven to live with You there

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Once in royal David's city
Stood a lowly cattle shed
Where a mother laid her baby
In a manger for his bed
Mary was that mother mild
Jesus Christ her little child

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: He came down to earth from heaven
Who is God and Lord of all
And His shelter was a stable
And His cradle was a stall
With the poor and meek and lowly
Lived on earth our Savior holy

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Jesus is our childhood's pattern
Day by day like us He grew
He was little weak and helpless
Tears and smiles like us He knew
And He feels for all our sadness
And He shares in all our gladness

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: And our eyes at last shall see Him
Through His own redeeming love
For that child so dear and gentle
Is our Lord in heaven above
And He leads His children on
To the place where He is gone

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: O come O come Emmanuel
To ransom captive Israel
That mourns in lonely exile here
Until the Son of God appear

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: Rejoice, Rejoice
Emmanuel
Shall come to thee O Israel

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: O come Thou Dayspring come and cheer
Our spirits by Thine advent here
Disperse the gloomy clouds of night
And death's dark shadows put to flight

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: O come Thou Wisdom from on high
And order all things far and nigh
To us the path of knowledge show
And cause us in her ways to go

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: O come Desire of nations bind
All peoples in one heart and mind
Bid envy strife and quarrels cease
Fill the whole world with heaven's peace

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: While shepherds watched
Their flocks by night
All seated on the ground
The angel of the Lord came down
And glory shone around

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: "Fear not" said he for mighty dread
Had seized their troubled minds
"Glad tidings of great joy I bring
To you and all mankind"

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: "To you in David's town this day
Is born of David's line
The Savior who is Christ the Lord
And this shall be the sign:"

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: "The heavenly Babe you there shall find
To human view displayed
All meekly wrapped in swaddling clothes
And in a manger laid"

lyrics.label: Verse 5
lines: All glory be to God on high
And to the earth be peace
Good will hence forth
From heaven to men
Begin and never cease
